education.institution: Ho Chi Minh City University of Science
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.location: 227 Nguyen Van Cu Street, District 5, Ho Chi Minh City
education.description: Specialized in Computer Vision and Robotics with a focus on machine learning and artificial intelligence applications. Completed coursework in advanced algorithms, computer vision, robotics systems, and software engineering.

thesis.title: Content-Based Image Retrieval using MSER in Large-Scale Databases
thesis.description: Research and implementation of semantic image retrieval algorithms in large databases using Maximally Stable Extremal Regions (MSER) for feature detection and matching.

achievements: Participated in multiple university-level programming competitions

institutionInfo.description: Ho Chi Minh City University of Science (HCMUS) is one of Vietnam's leading universities in scientific research and technology education. Founded in 1941, it is a member of the Vietnam National University, Ho Chi Minh City system. The university is renowned for its strong programs in natural sciences, computer science, and technology.
institutionInfo.ranking: Top 3 in Vietnam for Computer Science
